title: veTri aruLum
sahitya:
veTriyaruLum vElaip-paTRi murugan nirkka vIN kavalai unakkEnO nenjamE


anupallavi

  neTri nayanamArum ninrezhum shuDarAnOn shuTrum Ana vandannait-tolaittiDat-tAi tanda


caraNam    jnAna jnAyirammaiyan nammanattiruL pOkkum nandA oLiyAvAn namakkini bhayamillai 
vAnaLAvi IdargaL malai pOlum kaDal pOlum vandAl varaTTum nAm vaNangiyaDaiyak-kayyil
